title: Lismer
creator_credit: Tom Daly, ONF | NFB and Allan Wargon
brief_description: This film looks at the work of Arthur Lismer, a member of the Group of Seven, emphasizing his contribution to art education and to Canadian art. At the Montreal Art Centre we see how children learn the independence of creative self-expression in art.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Daly, ONF | NFB and Allan Wargon
